title: The last Paper-Printed spanish encyclopedia 1969-1977
description:
FILE: GRAN ENCICLOPEDIA RIALP , published 1969-1977




If you prefere on-line reading , download the jpg. giving you a page with access to the full text.


Before the internet , this was the last GREAT spanish reference work.

This encyclopedia was designed mostly for use in private high schools in the Spain of the 1970s.


      THE QUALITY OF THE WORK IS HIGH , BUT HAS A CATHOLIC- "TORY" EDITORIAL LINE.

      Nevertheless you can read articles such as "Democracy" of "Fascism" 
      without a feeling of wasting time , or meeting a TEA PARTY publication.



UNFORTUNATELY: it is necessary the (((e-sword))) software to use the work.

This ugly software HAS NOTHING IN COMMON WITH THE SPANISH ENCYCLOPEDIA , which , i repeat , was published in 1969 , as a work of the best Spanish Universitary Staff.
